title: Little Lies
lyrics:
What if all this was a little lie
What if all my sins never met a god
Would you be prepared, would you be surprised
Only then would you realize
Look up look up look

The sky is falling

She's falling

For you



Look up look up look

The sky is falling

She's falling

For you



Take her hand, brother

Hereâ€™s your chance

Love her
